participant_1.background:
I have a book of nursery rhymes for my infant son.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i teach kindergarten.
i have a job as an it agent.

participant_2.background:
I collect books about health and wellness.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I'm proud of my ability to find the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
i have a younger sibling.
i am a very tall woman.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for work?
I am a nutritionist! I love helping people learn how to live healthier lives.
That's awesome! I am an IT agent. I love helping people with their technology problems.
That's great! I bet you have to be really patient!
I try to be! It can be tough sometimes.
I bet! I know I would get frustrated.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love reading about health and wellness. I also like to cook healthy meals.
That's great! I love to read too! Do you have any favorite books?
I love reading books about nutrition and cooking. I also like to read fiction books.
Me too! I love a good mystery novel.
Me too! I love being kept guessing.
Do you have any siblings?
I have one younger sister.
I have 5 brothers and sisters!
Wow! That must be a lot of fun!
It can be! I love having a big family.
I bet! Do you guys get together often?
We try to! We usually get together for holidays and birthdays.
That's great! I wish I saw my family more often.
I'm sorry to hear that! Hopefully you can get together soon.
Me too! Thanks for chatting with me!
No problem! It was nice talking to you
